text:
We have noticed that people are sometimes doing workarounds because specific functions are not exposed to the user. This includes flattening niimgs to process all voxels or using third party packages (such as nibabel) to load files.

I list here the functions that we plan to create / expose. Do not hesitate to modify them:
- [x] `clean_img`
- [ ] `check_niimg` (exposed as `load_niimg`)
